item.title: Conversion scripts for generating compatible maps
item.description:
From dirk.jae...@gmail.com on May 28, 2010 10:35:22
Please provide the scripts to convert OSM maps to your map format.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=8

item.contents:
From jjbross@gmail.com on May 31, 2010 03:15:08
Maybe we should integrate the converter into osmosis as a plugin. That would allow to to integrate the processes of cutting out the region of interest from a larger OSM raw data file and generating a map file.

From sinikka....@gmail.com on October 04, 2010 02:02:14
A detailed tutorial with comments on all settings will be published as soon as possible. Before that some evaluation has to be done and some little issues have to be fixed. You will be immediately informed when our converting tools are in a stable version.
